name: Virtual Duck Life Simulator
description:
If you're looking for a duck simulator game, then you've got the best of duck life games. No more delays for an amazing adventure and challenging your skills to manage cluster duck life. Gear up and let's start play the game and enjoy your free time. This game is a unique addition to the animal category. You will enjoy animal life in this game. You will train your duck for different household and other activities. In this duck game, you will learn about daily activities and how they manage their daily tasks to keep their family life perfect. This game is also designed for all ages. There are many difficult levels in this game like hunting animals for food, growing duck kids and many more are there. This game will give you the best real-time pet life experience like never before. There are so many features included as the duck's life responsibilities. Collects the material from different places and makes her nest for the family. Once you make this nest, you will complete the level. You will enjoy the multiple levels, and you will learn how the animal survives in your real life.

FEATURING:
• Adorable characters
• Outstanding graphics
• Amazing gameplay sound with attractive animation
• High quality graphics with 3D environment
